roleset.name: to attack or damage, attacking with bombs
roleset.note: BOMB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bomb' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bomb.01-v predicate notes)
BOMBING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, bomb-v.01. No VNcls. (from bombing.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: And only last week [the newspaper Vanguardia Liberal in the city of Bucaramanga]*-1 was bombed [*-1], and its installations destroyed [*-2] .

example.name: both args
example.text: On July 1sr 2011 , 1.7 million people assembled in Green Square , Tripoli to show defiance against the Nato bombing of Libya .

roleset.name: to fail
roleset.note: BOMB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bomb' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bomb.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: But the product , which [*T*-1] was n't as concentrated as the new Cheer , bombed in a market test in Denver and was dropped [*-2].
example.arg: the product , which [*T*-1] was n't as concentrated as the new Cheer ,
in a market test in Denver

example.name: with task
example.text: John, like, totally bombed his linguistics test.
